colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(MYUR MDZAD YE SHES MGON PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR 'DI NI RGYUD LAS GSUM PA'I 'DIR LHAN THABS BSNAN NA BRIS PA NI, DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON @007B PO MING CAN GYIS BDAG DANG BDAG SKAM MNYAM RNAMS SU PHAN PAR RE BA BSAM PA'I SGO NAS BGYIS LA, NYE LTUNG LHAG CHAR BYUNG BA BLA MA MGON PO 'KHOR BCAS KYIS SPYAN SNGAR BSHAGS PA 'BROD PAR ZHUS, GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA DE YIS BDAG SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD BYANG CHUB SNYING PO MA THOB KYI BAR DU BLA MA MGON PO 'KHOR BCAS KYIS 'BRAL MED GROGS MDZOD NAS 'GAL RKYEN BAR CHOD KUN SEL ZHING MCHOG DNGOS GRUB THOB PA'I GROGS MDZOD PAR GYUR CIG , ,,PHAN PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
